solution_line_template: Tabitha has {initial_money}-{money_to_mom} = <<{initial_money}-{money_to_mom}={money_after_mom}>>{money_after_mom} dollars after giving some to her mom.
Tabitha has {money_after_mom}/{investment_divisor} = <<{money_after_mom}/{investment_divisor}={money_after_investment}>>{money_after_investment} dollars left after putting some in a money market.
The {num_items} items Tabitha buys totals out to {num_items}*{cost_per_item} = <<{num_items}*{cost_per_item}={total_item_cost}>>{total_item_cost} dollars.
